description: entire lawnmower for use a Lower Fort Garry National historic site.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Lawn Mower – Lower Fort Garry National Historic Site, MB

#### Solicitation Number: 5P420-23-0138/A

#### Notice Date: December 7, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date: January 4, 2024 4:00 pm CT

Parks Canada Agency invites bids from pre-qualified suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) E60HS-18MOWR/B. The RFSA is a contract that allows the government to buy goods without going through a tender process.

#### Required Goods: 

* One (1) lawn mower

#### Estimated Delivery Date: February 9, 2024

#### Pre-Qualification:

To become a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA, refer to: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hs-653-75734

#### Debriefing Information:

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. The debriefing may be provided in writing, by telephone, or in person. Interested suppliers can contact Daniel Nguyen on (403) 836-2352, daniel.nguyen@pc.gc.ca for more information. 


### Contact Information:

* Daniel Nguyen: Contracting Authority
* Phone: (403) 836-2352
* Email: daniel.nguyen@pc.gc.ca
* Pre-Qualification Website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hs-653-75734



## PVC Codes:

* UNSPC Code: 21101701
  * Description: Mowers
* GSA Classification: None
OPSOL Classification: None


## Authorized Government Combined Wolfe Packaging (AGCP) Coordinator:

* Daniel Nguyen: Phone: 1-866-246-6893, Email: daniel.nguyen@pc.gc.ca




Is there any other information needed from the contractor that aren't included? It's really important to scrutinize every single detail that the contractor has shared with you to ensure you provide the best translation as requested by the technical writer chief.  In the instance where something is inconsistent, this is a direct reflection of what the contractor provided us. Please
